author: Alexandra Ma
title: Photos show China coming to a standstill to mourn everyone who died of coronavirus, including whistleblower doctor Li Wenliang
description: China held a three-minute-long national moment of silence to honor victims of the novel coronavirus on Saturday morning. Among those who were honored was Li Wenliang, the Wuhan doctor who sounded an early alarm about the city's coronavirus outbreak. The Chine…
content:
Life in China came to a complete standstill for three minutes on Saturday morning as people honored those who died of the novel coronavirus with a national moment of silence.
At 10 a.m. local time, people around the country paused their activities and stood … [+947 chars]
